Issue.creator: elli-androulaki
Issue.summary: As an application developer I want to be able to leverage a library to perform transaction data encryption/decryption
Issue.description: This would be a library that leverages at the chaincode side access to chaincode SHIM (transient-data) and the already implemented BCCSP to decrypt encrypted incoming (to the chaincode) data, and encrypt chaincode state data (uniformly across same chaincode executions).
